dialogue: Ya.. same spot.
:( IMA So bored
Cnt talk now, boss is giving dirty looks
I’ll send U somthng to cheer U up :p
oh wondrous rain clouds...don’t thunder too loudly... my lover is sleeping ...
Clouds with your naughty ways, are only causing a flutter in my heart. My lover is far away and maybe you can carry this message to him.
Whats up?
Same ol
I am thinking of U...wen do I C U
Same time :) But we better not get late today. Prabha is getting suspicious
Prabha, everyone is ready.
Its ok... I don’t mind waiting...
Were you bored?
There was an order for 50 of these today... I took one for you
I know you had that pet duck as a kid!
Won’t your boss mind... that you took one?
I don’t care what he thinks...he is really getting on my nerves!

He got some 4 likes on tiktok and now he wants to put up new songs every week. That fucker... he saw my t shirt and forced me to swap with him. He said it was more ‘youtube appropriate’ Then when I asked him for it back he started abusing me... !
Well..you do have nice clothes.. He must be jealous of you!
You see me now..
If you don’t see someone for a long time, would you forget their face?
What is the matter?
I have a farm and two elephants and I go hunting for pigeons in my free time.
Oh.. Yes...myself... MSC Physics. I expect a Bajaj scooter and two cows for dowry!
No no. I can only give a microwave and one cow only!
Marrying your daughter for so cheap? No way!
This guy is handsome!
Very handsome. If I make a fake profile on this marriage site... and change my name to some Hindu fellow... your father might send you my photo...?
What would be your fake name?
Let’s say ‘Ajayan’!
Even if he did... I will reject them.
You are very hard to please!
I feel your heartbeat.
It is beating very fast...
Can you feel mine?
Yea....
It’s not fair!
Its ok... cheer up...
Shiaz look there! There is a sign for ‘Sri Krishna Hotel’ in the distance across the road.
Should we go?
I don't have enough cash
I got some...
Uh... Anu... maybe its not a good idea.. They won’t allow us if they find out.
If they find out.
We would like a room for two.
Maybe she is frustrated.
Why is taking it out on me? She snapped at me today, totally out of the blue!
Forget about all that... I have some news that will cheer you up!
Nothing can cheer me up....
Fine! Then I won’t tell you.
Tell me!
Please tell me!
Come on!
Ok ok! So.... Do you have a burqa?
Why would I have a burqa, Shiaz!
Well... you will need a burqa if we need to be successful at our plan.
What is it?
Aunty and Uncle are going to a wedding tomorrow night.
No need to scrunch up your pretty face, detective.
So your place will be free!?
Sorry sorry... my wife just realised she is pregnant.
Hey... have U left?
Yea
U can’t come here!
I am sorry!!
Everyone came back early..Nikah cancelled.... the Harbour Metro Line is flooded... :( Dnt b mad.
I wish I cd sit w U.
me 2
I like your yellow dress!
Don’t stare at me or someone will get suspicious.
You should have thought of that before looking so beautiful.
Cooo!
Coo!
I am sure there are a lot of wild animals.
Are there any?
Will you be long?
No..not long
Kiss me again...
Ok save some for later!
The fish is excellent Parvati

I heard someone coming into the jungle...and my first thought was, it is you?... I got up and looked around. There, I saw a group of soldiers coming towards me. And they started shouting, catch him catch him.
Amongst them, I saw a large, older man. And when I looked close, I saw that he had your father’s face... but he too was a soldier!
They started shouting... there is the terrorist... catch him, catch him! Don’t let him go.....I ran as fast as I could... I was shit scared...
I ran as fast as I could. I didn’t look back but. I could hear their voices behind me.
Anyway...It was only a dream...
Yea...
Come, I want to show you a place I found.
How did you find this place?
Doesn’t it look like her eyes are following me?
Renu is only for Minesh.... Pappu and Shalu... forever.
I like this place...it has an another-worldly feeling about it. As if only you and I can see it... no one else...
Shiaz
Hmm?
Do you ever think about... what things will be like in the future?
What do you mean?
I mean like... the future...like in ten years time... or twenty years time... What will your life be like?
I think about it sometimes
Am I there... with you?
What has come over you?
I don’t know... I never used to really think about the future, you know... but now I feel as if the future has arrived and I am not prepared for it...
I remember there was this boy I liked in school...I was 12 years old... We used to take the school bus together.
He was very strict with you wasn't he?
Why don’t my parents understand what I want?...
Maybe we can talk to them... make them understand. You never know...people can surprise you.
I am afraid that...If I tell them about you... they will never let me see you again... Shiaz, I am scared
I have been scared since I met you.
I used to ask myself many times... if I was doing the right thing being with you....or it would have been best to stay apart.
But then ...when I am with you… I don't know what it is… I feel not afraid at all.. As if this Is the most natural way for us to be.
Its all too heavy for me sometimes..
Shiaz... look... there is graffiti here in Malayalam...
Our love is endless like the sea.. We shall flow with it wherever it takes us...
You wrote it... didn't you?
